file_content.text: The sooner Malgus is dethroned, the sooner the Republic can breathe easy.
It's an honor, Master Jedi. The stealth fighter is ready for your departure.
The stealth fighter is primed and ready for departure.
Captain Cantarus will fly you to Darth Malgus's space station. The Republic's counting on you.
The Supreme Commander has ordered this hangar locked.
[You must wait a while before repeating this difficulty mode. Return later.]
[You are not yet eligible for this difficulty mode.]
